manpage.title: strlen, wcslen

description.para: Get the length of a string.

return.para: Both functions return the number of characters in string, excluding the terminal NULL. No return value is reserved to indicate an error.

remarks.para: Both functions return the number of characters in string, not including the terminating null character. wcslen is a wide-character version of strlen; the argument of wcslen is a wide-character string. wcslen and strlen behave identically otherwise.

manpage.result: 'How long am I?' is 14 characters long
